channel.title: VictoryRs - "When RSPS's defeated Runescape"
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7]VictoryRs[/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][URL=http://"http://victoryrsps.enjin.com/"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://victoryrsps.enjin.com/webclient"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38535602/victoryx/VictoryRSPS.jar"]Download Client[/URL][/B]
[B][SIZE=4]Intro:[/SIZE][/B]
[I]Hello there, My name is Ray and this is my first Runescape Private Server. I used to code back in 2009 but stopped because of IRL issues. Now I am back with a great RSPS for you. In VictoryRs, we strive to create a nice community; where users enjoy the gameplay of great content. This server was not created to become big with thousands of players, just a community with a decent amount of players. Here at VictoryRs, we want the users to have fun with an easy gameplay. Unlike Rs, we want the users to have all that they always wanted to have: A nice amount of cash stack, items, and stats. We try our best to listen to the users as they are the main reason we are online. We want to listen to the community and create the content mostly voted by them. We have staff members that enforce the rules and encourage everyone to follow them. If you are looking for a Runescape Private Server that is easy to become rich and want your suggestions to be added to server, then come and join us. [/I]
[B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[I]- 24/7 Uptime - Daily Updates - Nice community - All Minigames fully working: Barrows, Pest Control, Tzhaar, Duel Arena, Fight Pits, - All Bosses fully working: Godwars, King Black Dragon, Dagannoth Kings, Chaos Elemental, Sea Troll Queen, Lakhrahnaz, Nomad, Giant Sea Snake, Avatar of Destruction - Fully functional Pking System - Duel Arena working with no bugs/dupes - Pking Zones: Edgeville, Graveyard, 44 Portal, Greater Demons, Ardy Lever - Active Pking - Active Staking/Dueling - Active Dicing - Custom Skill Arena - Pk Point System/Shop - Curses - Completionist System/Cape - Lottery System - Nex Items: Torva/Virtus/Pernix - Fully working Korasi - Fully working Overloads - Penguins with Ecto-Tokens that give you rewards - Many more to come![/I]
[B]Promo Vid:[/B]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oz-wbXLvl3o[/youtube]
[B][SIZE=5]MEDIA:[/SIZE][/B]

[CENTER][B][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7]VictoryRs[/SIZE][/FONT][/B]

[B][URL=http://“http://victoryrsps.enjin.com/”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://victoryrsps.enjin.com/webclient”]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38535602/victoryx/VictoryRSPS.jar”]Download Client[/URL][/B]

[B][SIZE=4]Intro:[/SIZE][/B]

[I]Hello there, My name is Ray and this is my first Runescape Private Server. I used to code back in 2009 but stopped because of IRL issues. Now I am back with a great RSPS for you. In VictoryRs, we strive to create a nice community; where users enjoy the gameplay of great content. This server was not created to become big with thousands of players, just a community with a decent amount of players. Here at VictoryRs, we want the users to have fun with an easy gameplay. Unlike Rs, we want the users to have all that they always wanted to have: A nice amount of cash stack, items, and stats. We try our best to listen to the users as they are the main reason we are online. We want to listen to the community and create the content mostly voted by them. We have staff members that enforce the rules and encourage everyone to follow them. If you are looking for a Runescape Private Server that is easy to become rich and want your suggestions to be added to server, then come and join us. [/I]

[B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B]

[I]- 24/7 Uptime

  • Daily Updates
  • Nice community
  • All Minigames fully working: Barrows, Pest Control, Tzhaar, Duel Arena, Fight Pits,
  • All Bosses fully working: Godwars, King Black Dragon, Dagannoth Kings, Chaos Elemental, Sea Troll Queen, Lakhrahnaz, Nomad, Giant Sea Snake, Avatar of Destruction
  • Fully functional Pking System
  • Duel Arena working with no bugs/dupes
  • Pking Zones: Edgeville, Graveyard, 44 Portal, Greater Demons, Ardy Lever
  • Active Pking
  • Active Staking/Dueling
  • Active Dicing
  • Custom Skill Arena
  • Pk Point System/Shop
  • Curses
  • Completionist System/Cape
  • Lottery System
  • Nex Items: Torva/Virtus/Pernix
  • Fully working Korasi
  • Fully working Overloads
  • Penguins with Ecto-Tokens that give you rewards
  • Many more to come![/I]
